short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Commit custom mesages with a single click on Github! Silly idea from @HackerNewsOnion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds one-click commit message buttons to Github's online editor! The list is customizable to your liking.
Inspired by a silly idea from @HackerNewsOnion
